item.title: Lobsters Top Stories: Sunday, March 2, 2025 at 10:15 PM UTC
item.description:

13. Hardware discovery: ACPI & Device Tree (19 points | 14 comments)
14. The Pentium contains a complicated circuit to multiply by three (3 points | no comments)
15. Making o1, o3, and Sonnet 3.7 Hallucinate for Everyone (19 points | 21 comments)
16. Your Next Two Zeroes (68 points | 2 comments)
